com.aionemu.gameserver.services
Class ItemService

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.gameserver.services.ItemService

public class ItemService
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
ATracer This class is used for Item manipulations (creation, disposing, modification) Can be used as a factory for Item objects

newItem

public static Item newItem(int itemId,
                           long count)
Parameters:
itemId -
count -
Returns:
Creates new Item instance. If count is greater than template maxStackCount, count value will be cut to maximum allowed This method will return null if ItemTemplate for itemId was not found.

decreaseItemCountByItemId

public static boolean decreaseItemCountByItemId(Player player,
                                                Storage storage,
                                                int itemId,
                                                long count)
Used to reduce item count in bag or completely remove by ITEMID This method operates in iterative manner overl all items with specified ITEMID. Return value can be the following: - true - item removal was successfull - false - not enough amount of items to reduce or item is not present

Parameters:
itemId -
count -
Returns:
true or false

addItem

public static boolean addItem(Player player,
                              int itemId,
                              long count)
Adds item count to player inventory I moved this method to service cause right implementation of it is critical to server operation and could cause starvation of object ids. This packet will send necessary packets to client (initialize used only from quest engine

Parameters:
player -
itemId -
count - - amount of item that were not added to player's inventory
